name: Space Rocks Radar - Gamemaker Tutorial Mod
name_original: Space Rocks Radar - Gamemaker Tutorial Mod
description:
Classic Asteroids with a twist. Radar pings will expose asteroids, upgrade your ship and make it to 1000 points!

Controls:

UP/DOWN or W/S: move
LEFT/RIGHT or A/D: change direction
SPACE or MOUSE CLICK: shoot
    
PRESS SPACE TO START

PRESS U TO UPGRADE YOUR SHIP
